Room.Name: Champion's Ready Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the ready room for champions.
Room.LongDescription: This is a healing room reserved for arena champions. Anyone who comes in here is a fighter who has won many battles on the arena floor. A healing mage stands by, ready to cast healing spells on any who needs them. She is impartial in whom she treats, and will treat everyone, but if you want a spell cast on you, you must ask her for it.
